TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageQueueInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 允许安装并配置应用程序运行所需的队列。

span.span: Allows you to install and configure a queue that your application needs in order to run.

summary.span: 安装实用工具（例如 InstallUtil.exe）在安装 时调用此类。

span.span: This class is called by the installation utility, for example, InstallUtil.exe, when installing a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装实用工具使用来写入与队列关联的注册表值。The is used by the installation utility to write registry values that are associated with the queue. 有关安装实用工具的详细信息, 请参阅[installutil.exe (安装程序工具)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。For more information about installation utilities, see [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 若要安装队列, 请创建从中继承的项目安装程序类, 并将类`true`的设置为。To install a queue, create a project installer class that inherits from the , and set the for the class to `true`. 在项目中, 为安装中的每个队列创建一个实例, 并将该实例添加到项目安装程序类。Within your project, create a instance for each queue in the installation and add the instance to your project installer class. 创建实例时, 可以选择将现有的 (例如, 从测试服务器) 传递到构造函数。When creating a instance, you can optionally pass an existing (for example, from a test server) to the constructor. 此方法通过镜像传入队列的设置, 自动为新队列提供配置设置。This approach automatically provides the configuration settings for the new queue by mirroring the settings of the queue passed in. 或者, 可以手动将实例中的属性设置为所需的状态, 并调用无参数的构造函数。Alternatively, you can manually set the properties in the instance to the states you want and call the parameterless constructor. 在调用安装实用程序时, 它将查找。When the install utility is called, it looks for the . 如果是`true`, 则实用工具将在与项目安装程序关联的集合中安装所有队列。If it is `true`, the utility installs all the queues in the collection associated with your project installer. 如果 为`false`, 则实用工具将忽略项目安装程序。If is `false`, the utility ignores the project installer. 在将实例添加 到项目安装程序的集合之前或之后, 可以修改实例的其他属性。You modify other properties of a instance either before or after adding the instance to the collection of your project installer. 例如, 必须在安装实用工具执行之前设置队列。For example, a queue's must be set before the install utility executes. 通常, 你不会从代码中调用的方法, 通常仅由 installutil.exe 安装实用工具调用它们。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 实用程序会在安装过程中自动调用方法, 并在安装未引发异常时调用。The utility automatically calls the method during the installation process and calls if the installation did not throw an exception. 如果需要, 它会通过调用生成异常的对象来实现故障。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling for the object that generated the exception. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 当应用程序安装每个实例时, 此状态信息会不断更新。This state information is continuously updated as each instance is installed by the utility. 通常, 您的代码不需要显式修改状态信息。It is not usually necessary for your code to explicitly modify the state information.

span.span: Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 不设置任何实例属性。

span.span: Does not set any instance properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.MessageQueue componentToCopy) cil managed

param.name: componentToCopy
param.span: 组件，其设置确定安装的新队列的属性设置。

span.span: The component whose settings determine the property settings of the new queue installed.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将安装设置初始化为现有 实例的安装设置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, initializing the installation settings to those of an existing instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Authenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Authenticate : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示要安装的队列是否只接受已经过身份验证的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue to be installed accepts only authenticated messages.

value.span: 如果队列仅接受已经过身份验证的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the queue accepts only authenticated messages; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将未经过身份验证的消息发送到只接受经过身份验证的消息的队列, 则会拒绝该消息。When a non-authenticated message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages, the message is rejected. 发送应用程序可以通过设置消息的来请求拒绝消息。The sending application can request notification of a message rejection by setting the for the message. 否则, 将不会指示消息被拒绝, 因此除非将消息发送到死信队列, 否则消息可能会丢失。Otherwise, there is no indication that the message was rejected, so the message can be lost unless you send it to the dead-letter queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short BasePriority { short get(); void set(short value); };
member this.BasePriority : int16 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在网络上路由公共队列消息的基本优先级。

span.span: Gets or sets the base priority that is used to route a public queue's messages over the network.

value.span: 发送到公共队列的所有消息的单个基本优先级。

span.span: The single base priority for all messages sent to the public queue.

value.span: 默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: The default is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于通过网络路由队列消息。The is used for routing the queue's messages over the network. 使用为发送到队列的消息提供比发送到其他队列的消息更高或较低的优先级。Use the to give the messages sent to the queue a higher or lower priority than that for messages sent to other queues. 设置队列的基本优先级后, 发送到该队列的所有消息的优先级高于基本优先级发送到队列的消息。When a queue's base priority is set, all the messages sent to it are given a higher priority than that of the messages sent to queues with a lower base priority. 队列的基本优先级对队列中的消息顺序或如何从队列中读取消息不起作用。The queue's base priority has no effect on the order of the messages in the queue or on how messages are read from the queue. 仅适用于通过域控制器 (即, 使用公共格式名称) 访问的公共队列。The applies only to public queues that are accessed through the domain controller (in other words, using the public format name). 专用队列和直接访问的公共队列的基本优先级始终为零。The base priority of private queues and of directly accessed public queues is always zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid Category { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };
member this.Category : Guid with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置实现特定的队列类型。

span.span: Gets or sets an implementation-specific queue type.

value.span: ，表示队列类别（或“消息队列”类型标识符），允许应用程序按照其队列的使用方式对这些队列进行分类。

span.span: A that represents the queue category (or Message Queuing type identifier), which allows applications to categorize their queues according to how they are used.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "队列" 类别, 应用程序可以根据所用的方式对关联的队列进行分类。The queue category enables an application to categorize associated queues according to the way they are used. 可以为 null 引用。The can be a null reference. 还可以定义新类别。You can also define a new category. 属性提供对 "消息队列" 类型标识符属性的访问, 该属性与特定队列相关联, 并且是可读/写的。The property provides access to the Message Queuing type identifier property, which is associated with a particular queue and is read/write. 您可以使用方法来创建一个可保证在所有值之间唯一的类别值。You can use the method to create a category value that is guaranteed to be unique across all values. 但是, 只需将类别值与其他类别 (而不是所有其他值) 区别。However, it is necessary only for the category value to be distinct from other categories, not from all other values. 例如, 你可以将一个{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}队列组的设置为, 并将另一个组{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}的设置为。For example, you can set the for one group of queues to {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} and the for another group to {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Commit (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: 一个 ，它包含计算机的安装后状态。

span.span: A that contains the post-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 通过提交 方法写入注册表的 安装信息来完成安装过程。

span.span: Completes the installation process by committing the installation information that the method wrote to the registry.

summary.span: 此方法应该由安装工具使用，安装工具将自动调用相应的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 你不会从代码中调用的方法, 通常仅由 installutil.exe 安装实用工具调用它们。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 实用程序在安装过程中会自动调用方法。The utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 安装是事务性的, 因此, 如果在安装过程中任何安装项目组件发生故障, 则所有以前安装的组件都将回滚到其安装前状态。Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states. 这可以通过调用每个组件的方法来实现。This is accomplished by calling each component's method. 在成功安装与安装项目关联的所有组件后, 安装实用程序会提交安装。After a successful installation of all the components that are associated with the installation project has occurred, the installation utility commits the installations. 通过将队列设置为适当的初始状态来完成的安装。 completes the installation of the by setting the queue to the appropriate initial state. 如果由属性指定的队列已存在并且包含消息, 则将清除消息。If the queue specified by the property already exists and contains messages, clears the messages. 不会清除消息, 因为无法回滚清除消息的操作。, rather than , clears the messages because the act of purging the messages cannot be rolled back. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 当实用工具提交每个 实例时, 会不断`savedState`更新作为参数传递给的状态信息。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility commits each instance. 通常, 你的代码不需要显式修改此状态信息。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information. 清除队列后, 会将一个日志条目发送到与安装相关联的。 `savedState`When the queue has been cleared, posts a log entry to the `savedState` that is associated with the installation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (component As IComponent)

span.span: A to use as a template for the .

summary.span: 复制在安装时消息队列所需的 组件的属性值。

span.span: Copies the property values of a component that are required at install time for a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 你不会从代码中调用的方法, 通常仅由 installutil.exe 安装实用工具调用它们。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 由安装实用工具用来将的属性值设置为现有的的值。 is used by the installation utility to set the property values for the to the values of an existing . 如果传入的的为空字符串 ("") , 则在执行安装程序之前, 必须将属性设置为非空值。 If the of the that is passed in is an empty string (""), you must set the property to a non-empty value before the installer executes.

exception.span: 与此 关联的组件不是 。

span.span: The component associated with this is not a .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::EncryptionRequired EncryptionRequired { System::Messaging::EncryptionRequired get(); void set(System::Messaging::EncryptionRequired value); };
member this.EncryptionRequired : System.Messaging.EncryptionRequired with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示队列是否仅接受私有（或加密）消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only private, or encrypted, messages.

value.span: 值之一，指示发送到队列的消息所需的加密级别。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the encryption level required on messages sent to the queue.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定 encryption 后, 只加密消息的。When encryption is specified, only the of a message is encrypted. 其他属性, 例如, 不加密。Other properties, such as the , are not encrypted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Install(class System.Collections.IDictionary stateSaver) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Install (stateSaver As IDictionary)

param.name: stateSaver
param.span: ，用于保存执行提交、回滚或卸载操作所需的信息。

span.span: A used to save information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.

summary.span: 执行安装并将消息队列信息写入注册表。

span.span: Performs the installation and writes message queue information to the registry.

summary.span: 此方法应该由安装工具使用，安装工具将自动调用相应的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将消息队列信息写入注册表, 并将该实例与位于属性指定的路径的队列关联。 The method writes message queue information to the registry, and associates the instance with a queue that is located at the path specified by the property. 如果该队列尚不存在, 则创建一个事务性队列。If the queue does not already exist, creates a transactional queue. 将新的或现有的队列属性设置为你在中指定的属性。 sets the new or existing queue properties to those that you have specified in the . 如果队列已存在, 则会将其属性重置为这些队列的属性。If the queue already exists, its properties are reset to those of the . 如果现有队列不是事务性的, 则会将其删除, 然后重新创建为事务性队列。If the existing queue is not transactional, it is deleted and then recreated as a transactional queue. > [!CAUTION] > 如果需要重新创建队列, 则队列中的消息将丢失。If it is necessary to recreate the queue, messages in the queue will be lost. 通常, 你不会从代码中调用的方法, 通常仅由 installutil.exe 安装实用工具调用它们。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 实用工具会在安装过程中自动调用方法, 以写入与正在安装的消息队列关联的注册表信息。The utility automatically calls the method during the installation process to write registry information that is associated with the message queue being installed. 安装是事务性的, 因此, 如果在安装过程中任何安装项目组件发生故障, 则所有以前安装的组件都将回滚到其安装前状态。Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states. 这可以通过调用每个组件的方法来实现。This is accomplished by calling each component's method. 在成功安装与安装项目关联的所有组件后, 安装实用程序会提交安装。After a successful installation of all the components that are associated with the installation project has occurred, the installation utility commits the installations. 通过将队列设置为适当的初始状态来完成的安装。 completes the installation of the by setting the queue to the appropriate initial state. 如果由属性指定的队列已存在并且包含消息, 则将清除消息。If the queue specified by the property already exists and contains messages, clears the messages. 不会清除消息, 因为无法回滚清除消息的操作。, rather than , clears the messages because the act of purging the messages cannot be rolled back. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 当实用工具安装每个 实例时, 会不断`stateSaver`更新作为参数传递给的状态信息。This state information, which is passed to as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility installs each instance. 通常, 你的代码不需要显式修改此状态信息。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsEquivalentInstaller(class System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller otherInstaller) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsEquivalentInstaller (otherInstaller As ComponentInstaller) As Boolean

span.span: The installer to compare.

summary.span: 确定指定的安装程序能否处理与此安装程序相同的安装类型。

span.span: Determines whether the specified installer can handle the same kind of installation as this installer.

returns.span: 如果此安装程序和 参数指定的安装程序可以处理相同的安装类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter can handle the same kind of installation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 仅`true`当此安装程序和`otherInstaller`参数指定的安装程序属于同一类型时才返回。Typically, returns `true` only if this installer and the installer specified by the `otherInstaller` parameter are of the same type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Label : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置队列说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a description of the queue.

value.span: 描述消息队列的标签。

span.span: The label that describes the message queue.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不需要在队列中是唯一的。The property does not need to be unique across queues.

span.span: The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaximumJournalSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaximumJournalSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与队列关联的日记的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the journal that is associated with the queue.

value.span: 日记队列的最大大小（以千字节为单位），该队列记录从队列中移除的消息。

span.span: The maximum size, in kilobytes, of the journal queue, which records messages that are removed from the queue.

value.span: 该消息队列默认为无限制。

span.span: The Message Queuing default is no limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建队列时, 消息队列会在与新队列相同的位置自动创建队列日志。When a queue is created, Message Queuing automatically creates a queue journal in the same location as the new queue. 队列日志用于跟踪从队列中删除的消息。The queue journal is used to track the messages that are removed from the queue. 两种类型的消息将保持未跟踪的: 从队列中删除的消息, 因为它们的接收时间计时器过期, 而是从队列中清除的消息。Two types of messages remain untracked: those that are removed from the queue because their time-to-be-received timer expired, and those that are purged from the queue. 应用程序无法将消息发送到日记队列。Applications cannot send messages to the journal queue. 但是, 您必须定期清除队列, 以删除不再需要的消息。However, you must periodically clear the queue to remove the messages that are no longer needed. 日志队列中存储的消息会计入队列所在计算机的配额。Messages stored in journal queues count toward the quota for the computer where the queues reside. (计算机配额由管理员设置。)(The computer quota is set by the administrator.)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaximumQueueSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaximumQueueSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置队列的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the queue.

value.span: 队列的最大大小，以千字节为单位。

span.span: The maximum size, in kilobytes, of the queue.

value.span: 该消息队列默认为无限制。

span.span: The Message Queuing default is no limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最大队列大小通常是在创建队列时设置的, 但可以在以后重置。The maximum queue size is typically set at the time of queue creation, although it can be reset later.

summary.span: 获取或设置与队列关联的多路广播地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the multicast address associated with the queue.

Docs.value:
包含有效的多路广播地址（格式如下）的 ，或者为 ，这表示队列与多路广播地址不关联。A that contains a valid multicast address (in the form shown below) or , which indicates that the queue is not associated with a multicast address.
``` <address>:<port> ```

span.span: MSMQ 3.0 is not installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由此对象引用的队列的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the queue that is referenced by this object.

value.span: 表示队列在网络中的位置的路径。

span.span: The path that represents the location of the queue in the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的语法取决于它所引用的队列的类型。The syntax for the property depends on the type of queue it references. 下表显示了在各种类型的队列中应使用的语法。The following table shows the syntax you should use for queues of various types. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`machineName`\\`queueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`machineName`\\`Private$`\\`queueName`| |日志队列Journal queue|`machineName`\\`queueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`machineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`machineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`machineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 使用 "." 表示本地计算机。Use "." for the local computer. 你还可以使用消息队列应用程序对象的或来描述队列路径。You can also use the or of a Message Queuing application object to describe the queue path. 下表显示了每种类型的引用的正确语法。The following table shows the proper syntax for each type of reference. |参考Reference|语法Syntax| |---------------|------------| |格式名称Format name|Msmq.formatname: [*格式名*]FormatName:[ *format name* ]| |LabelLabel|标签: [*标签*]Label:[ *label* ]| 如果正在脱机工作, 则必须使用格式名来定义队列。If you are working offline, you must use the format name to define the queue . 如果不这样做, 应用程序将引发异常, 因为主域控制器不可用于将解析 为。If you do not, the application will throw an exception, because the primary domain controller is unavailable to resolve the into the .

exception.span: 被设置为了无效值，可能是因为语法无效。

span.span: The was set to an invalid value, possibly because the syntax is not valid.
-or-
The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::AccessControlList ^ Permissions { System::Messaging::AccessControlList ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::AccessControlList ^ value); };
member this.Permissions : System.Messaging.AccessControlList with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与队列关联的权限。

span.span: Gets or sets permissions associated with the queue.

value.span: ，包含一个或多个指定受信者和为队列授予的权限的访问控制项。

span.span: A that contains one or more access control entries that specify the trustees and permissions to grant for the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 公用或专用队列的创建者具有 "完全控制" 权限, 而 "域组" 有权获取队列属性、获取权限和写入队列。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 消息队列依次访问每个权限列表项, 直到找到适用于当前用户和当前尝试的操作的权限列表。Message Queuing accesses each permission list entry in turn until it finds one that applies to the current user and the current attempted action. 与操作系统权限一样, 你明确拒绝用户的权限优先于你允许使用的权限。As with the operating system permissions, the rights that you specifically deny to a user take precedence over those you allow. 构造属性时, 请将实例添加到集合中。When you construct the property, add instances to your collection. 构造每个访问控制项时, 可以指定常规或标准访问权限。When you construct each access control entry, you can specify generic or standard access rights. 队列的权限可以是以下各项的任意组合:The rights to a queue can be any combination of the following: - 删除Delete - 读取安全性Read Security - 写入安全性Write Security - 同步Synchronize - 修改所有者Modify Owner - 读取Read - WriteWrite - 执行Execute - 必需Required - 全部All - NoneNone 这些权限是一组可以使用按位 "或" 组合的位标志:These rights are a set of bit flags that you can combine using the bitwise OR: - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 速览消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - 获取队列所有权Take Queue Ownership - 写入消息Write Message

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Rollback (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: A that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 通过回滚安装过程写入注册表的队列信息，将计算机还原到安装前的状态。

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation, by rolling back the queue information that the installation procedure wrote to the registry.

summary.span: 此方法应该由安装工具使用，安装工具将自动调用相应的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法撤消方法的效果。 The method undoes the effects of the method. 如果安装项目中的任何组件的安装失败, 则调用。 is called if the installation of any component in the installation project fails. 方法创建或设置队列的属性。The method creates or sets the properties for a queue. 删除队列或将预先存在的队列的属性重置为其预安装值。 either deletes the queue or resets the properties of a pre-existing queue to their pre-installation values. 通常, 你不会从代码中调用的方法, 通常仅由 installutil.exe 安装实用工具调用它们。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the InstallUtil.exe installation utility. 在安装失败后, 实用工具会自动调用方法, 以撤消安装进程已进行的任何更改。The utility automatically calls the method after an installation failure to undo any changes that the installation process has already made. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 当实用工具回滚每个 实例时, 会不断`savedState`更新作为参数传递给的状态信息。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility rolls back each instance. 通常, 你的代码不需要显式修改此状态信息。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Transactional { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Transactional : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示队列是否仅接受作为事务的一部分发送的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only messages sent as part of a transaction.

value.span: 如果队列仅接受作为事务的一部分发送的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the queue can only accept messages sent as part of a transaction; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用或不使用事务从本地事务队列检索消息。Messages can be retrieved from a local transaction queue with or without using a transaction. 如果未指定事务上下文, 则消息队列将为您创建单个内部事务。If you do not specify a transaction context, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction for you.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: 一个 ，它包含计算机的安装后状态。

span.span: A that contains the post-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 通过从注册表中移除队列信息来移除安装。

span.span: Removes an installation by removing queue information from the registry.

summary.span: 此方法应该由卸载工具使用，卸载工具自动调用相应的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by uninstallation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Remove` 如果为,则还会删除与关联的队列。If the is `Remove`, also deletes the queue associated with the . 通常情况下, 你不会从代码中调用的方法; 它们通常仅由 installutil.exe 安装实用工具 (在卸载模式下) 调用。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the InstallUtil.exe installation utility (in uninstall mode). 实用工具会自动调用方法, 将受安装影响的系统部件还原为其安装前的状态。The utility automatically calls the method to restore the parts of the system that were affected by the installation to their pre-installation states. 这包括删除与要卸载的 MessageQueue 关联的注册表信息。This includes deleting registry information that is associated with the MessageQueue being uninstalled. 应用程序的卸载例程使用项目安装程序的来自动维护有关已卸载的组件的信息。An application's uninstall routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been uninstalled. 当实用工具卸载每个 实例时, 会不断`savedState`更新作为参数传递给的状态信息。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility uninstalls each instance. 通常, 你的代码不需要显式修改此状态信息。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction UninstallAction { System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示安装程序在卸载时对队列执行的操作：移除队列，将队列还原为安装前的状态，或者将队列保留为当前的已安装状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates what the installer does with the queue at uninstall time: remove it, restore it to its pre-installation state, or leave it in its current installed state.

value.span: 值之一，指示在卸载 时队列保留在什么状态。

span.span: One of the values that indicates what state to leave the queue in when the is uninstalled.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装队列时, 可以选择使用现有队列。When you install a queue, you can optionally use an existing queue. 如果这样做, 则必须确定队列是否应恢复为其安装前的状态, 或保持其当前的安装后状态。If you do so, you must decide whether the queue should return to its pre-installation state, or remain in its current, post-installation state. 如果选择将队列返回到安装前的状态, 则在安装时从队列中删除的消息将不会还原。If you elect to return the queue to its pre-installation state, messages that were deleted from the queue at install time are not restored. 你可以仅将与关联的队列属性重置为其预安装值。You can reset only queue properties that are associated with the to their pre-installation values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseJournalQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseJournalQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示从队列中检索的消息是否也复制到关联的日记队列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages that are retrieved from the queue are also copied to the associated journal queue.

value.span: 如果将从队列中检索的消息复制到日记队列，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to copy messages that are retrieved from the queue to the journal queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用日记队列可以跟踪消息, 即使已从队列中检索消息。A journal queue lets you keep track of messages even after they have been retrieved from the queue. 但是, 两种类型的消息将保持未跟踪的: 在接收时间计时器过期时从队列中删除的消息, 以及从队列中清除的消息。However, two types of messages remain untracked: those that are removed from the queue when their time-to-be-received timer expires, and those that are purged from the queue. 应定期清除日记队列, 以删除不再需要的消息。A journal queue should be cleared periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 日志队列中存储的消息将计入日志所在计算机的配额。Messages stored in the journal queue count toward the quota for the computer on which the journal is located.
